name: inter-ui
description: Font files for the Inter font family.
author: Rasmus Andersson (https://rsms.me)

scripts.build-supersets: npm run cleanup-subsets && npm run delete-supersets && npm run copy-supersets
scripts.delete-supersets: rm -fr './web' && mkdir './web' && rm -fr './variable' && mkdir './variable' && rm -fr './display' && mkdir './display'
scripts.build-subsets: npm run cleanup-subsets && npm run delete-subsets && npm run subset-web && npm run subset-display && npm run subset-variable && npm run cleanup-subsets
scripts.delete-subsets: rm -fr './web-latin' && mkdir './web-latin' && rm -fr './variable-latin' && mkdir './variable-latin' && rm -fr './display-latin' && mkdir './display-latin'
